item.description:
You may have seen her perform at the Reason Rally.

Shelley Segal will be in Boston for the National Atheist Party's convention. I'll be hosting a house concert Wednesday night, 3 October. We'll also be treating Shelley to dinner before the concert, so please join us (and help split the tab :-) ).Â  She will have copies of her new CD, "An Atheist Album" to sell and sign.

Dinner will be at 6:30pm at Garrison's http://www.garrisonsbillerica.com/index.php, and the concert will be 8pm - 9pm, with CD signing afterwards. It will end at 10pm at the latest. This will be a small, intimate concert, held in my living room and dining room. Please RSVP so I'll know how many chairs I'll need.

Information about Shelley:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shelley_Segal

http://www.shelleysegal.com/

There will be a tip basket if you want to contribute to Shelley.
item.name: Shelley Segal house concert
